00034 /**
00035  * \file
00036  *         MSP430-specific rtimer code
00037  * \author
00038  *         Adam Dunkels <adam@sics.se>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #include "contiki.h"
00042 
00043 #ifdef __GNUC__
00044 #include <io.h>
00045 #include <signal.h>
00046 #endif
00047 
00048 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00049 #include <msp430.h>
00050 #endif
00051 
00052 #include "sys/energest.h"
00053 #include "sys/rtimer.h"
00054 #include "sys/process.h"
00055 #include "dev/watchdog.h"
00056 
00057 #define DEBUG 0
00058 #if DEBUG
00059 #include <stdio.h>
00060 #define PRINTF(...) printf(__VA_ARGS__)
00061 #else
00062 #define PRINTF(...)
00063 #endif
00064 
00065 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 #ifdef __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__
00067 #pragma vector=TIMERA0_VECTOR
00068 __interrupt void
00069 #else
00070 interrupt(TIMERA0_VECTOR)
00071 #endif
00072 timera0 (void) {
00073   ENERGEST_ON(ENERGEST_TYPE_IRQ);
00074 
00075   watchdog_start();
00076 
00077   rtimer_run_next();
00078 
00079   if(process_nevents() > 0) {
00080     LPM4_EXIT;
00081   }
00082 
00083   watchdog_stop();
00084 
00085   ENERGEST_OFF(ENERGEST_TYPE_IRQ);
00086 }
00087 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 void
00089 rtimer_arch_init(void)
00090 {
00091   dint();
00092 
00093   /* CCR0 interrupt enabled, interrupt occurs when timer equals CCR0. */
00094   TACCTL0 = CCIE;
00095 
00096   /* Enable interrupts. */
00097   eint();
00098 }
00099 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00100 rtimer_clock_t
00101 rtimer_arch_now(void)
00102 {
00103   rtimer_clock_t t1, t2;
00104   do {
00105     t1 = TAR;
00106     t2 = TAR;
00107   } while(t1 != t2);
00108   return t1;
00109 }
00110 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00111 void
00112 rtimer_arch_schedule(rtimer_clock_t t)
00113 {
00114   PRINTF("rtimer_arch_schedule time %u\n", t);
00115 
00116   TACCR0 = t;
00117 }
00118 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
